post.description: Can enable/disable node to node and client to node encryption. Supports rolling and non-rolling upgrade of the universe.

get.summary: list config entries for a scope
get.description: Lists all runtime config entries for a given scopes for current customer.
List all the mutable runtime config keys

Lists all (including empty scopes) runtime config scopes for current customer. List includes the Global scope that spans multiple customers, scope for customer specific overrides for current customer and one scope each for each universe and provider.

customerUUID.description: Customer UUID of the backup which it belongs to

inUse.description: Indicates whether the Certificate is in use or not

CertificateInfo.description: Certificate used by the universe to send sensitive information

error.example: There was a problem creating universe

sendAlertsToYb.description: Is alert has sent to YB

reportOnlyErrors.description: Is alert is just for error

reportBackupFailures.description: Is alert needed for backup failure

isPrimary.description: User is primary user or not

inUse.description: True if there is an in use reference to the object

mountPoints.description: Comma separated list of mount points for the devices in each instance

storageType.description: The type of storage used for this instance

encryptionAtRestEnabled.description: Whether a universe is currently encrypted at rest or not

opType.description: Whether to enable/disable/rotate universe key/encryption at rest

type.description: Whether to generate a data key or just retrieve the CMK arn

isMaster.description: True if this node is a master

isTserver.description: True if this node is a tserver

transactionalBackup.description: Is backup be transactional across tables
